title: Effect of insecticide treatment on plant growth 2

content.question: A student incorrectly plotted one value from the table on a graph (Figure 1). Identify the error in the student-constructed graph. Provide reasoning to support the student’s choice of a logarithmic scale on the Y axis.

frqParts.text: A student incorrectly plotted one value from the table on a graph (Figure 1). Identify the error in the student-constructed graph. Provide reasoning to support the student’s choice of a logarithmic scale on the Y axis.

skill.text: 4.B: Describe data from a table or graph, including: i. identifying specific data points ii. describing trends and patterns in the data iii. describing relationships between variables
